an1.31-40:31.1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it’s not tamed, is so very harmful as the mind.
an1.31-40:31.1.2: A wild mind is very harmful.”
an1.31-40:32.1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it is tamed, is so very beneficial as the mind.
an1.31-40:32.1.2: A tamed mind is very beneficial.”
an1.31-40:33.1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it’s not guarded, is so very harmful as the mind.
an1.31-40:33.1.2: An unguarded mind is very harmful.”
an1.31-40:34.1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it is guarded, is so very beneficial as the mind.
an1.31-40:34.1.2: A guarded mind is very beneficial.”
an1.31-40:35.1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it’s not protected, is so very harmful as the mind.
an1.31-40:35.1.2: An unprotected mind is very harmful.”
an1.31-40:36.1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it is protected, is so very beneficial as the mind.
an1.31-40:36.1.2: A protected mind is very beneficial.”
an1.31-40:37.1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it’s not restrained, is so very harmful as the mind.
an1.31-40:37.1.2: An unrestrained mind is very harmful.”
an1.31-40:38.1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it is restrained, is so very beneficial as the mind.
an1.31-40:38.1.2: A restrained mind is very beneficial.”
an1.31-40:39.1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it is not tamed, guarded, protected, and restrained, is so very harmful as the mind.
an1.31-40:39.1.2: An untamed, unguarded, unprotected, and unrestrained mind is very harmful.”
an1.31-40:40.1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it is tamed, guarded, protected, and restrained, is so very beneficial as the mind.
an1.31-40:40.1.2: A tamed, guarded, protected, and restrained mind is very beneficial.”
